passages.content:
From: Sofia Rivera
To: Training Office
Subject: Registration Question

Hello,

I would like to register three customer support representatives for the "Handling Difficult Calls" workshop on May 12. Could you confirm whether a vegetarian lunch option is available?

Also, our accounting team needs an invoice addressed to Northbay Solutions before we can process payment.

Thank you,
Sofia Rivera
Team Lead

From: Training Office
To: Sofia Rivera
Subject: RE: Registration Question

Dear Ms. Rivera,

Thank you for your message. Vegetarian lunches are available upon request.

The workshop fee is $180 per participant. An invoice for Northbay Solutions (Invoice #T-7714) will be emailed to your accounting team today.

Please note that cancellations made after May 5 will be charged in full.

Best regards,
Kenji Morita

passages.title: Workshop Agenda (May 12)
passages.content:
8:30-9:00  Check-in and badge pickup
9:00-10:30 Session 1: De-escalation techniques
10:30-10:45 Break
10:45-12:00 Session 2: Setting clear boundaries
12:00-1:00  Lunch

Participants must bring a photo ID to receive a badge. Parking fees will be waived for attendees who arrive before 8:20.

questions.stem: Why does Ms. Rivera email the Training Office?

options.A: To request a refund for a workshop
options.B: To ask about registration details and payment requirements
options.C: To complain about the workshop instructor
options.D: To reserve a meeting room for her team

questions.explanation: She asks about registering three employees, lunch options, and an invoice needed for payment processing.

questions.stem: How much does the workshop cost per person?
questions.explanation: The Training Office states that the fee is $180 per participant.

questions.stem: In the schedule, the word "waived" is closest in meaning to
questions.explanation: "Parking fees will be waived" means the fees will not be charged (they are cancelled/removed).

questions.stem: By what date must Northbay Solutions cancel to avoid being charged in full?
questions.explanation: The cancellation policy says cancellations made after May 5 will be charged in full.

questions.stem: Which is NOT mentioned in the passages?

options.A: The start time of the workshop

questions.explanation: No hotel information or discounts are mentioned anywhere in the passages.
